subject: Dear Sir/Madam,
body:
Dear Sir/Madam,
We are doing  the above-mentioned project and would like to 
receive your most Competitive Offer
of the above subject by 5th March 2018 or before.
Your offer should highlight/include for the following.
·         Compliance statement confirming Full Compliance with 
the relevant drawings and specification.
·         Any deviation from the specification. 
·         Recommended list of spares with related costs.
·         Extended Warranties with any cost implications – as 
required by specification.
·         Delivery to site, clearly identifying delivery 
period/lead in times.
·         Price breakdown against the BOQ items.                  
 
·         Validity period of 60 days.
·         Payment Terms 
·         All Terms and Conditions to be as per BK Gulf Standard 
LPO/Supply Agreement/Subcontract Agreement
                     as appropriate  and as maybe amended to 
reflect those in place between BK Gulf and the Client.
 Enclosed/Attached Documents 
·         specifications
·         drawings
Best Regards
 
Sunil
Sunil Nair
Project Controls – Technical Manager  | BK Gulf
mob: 055 8769870| e:   
sunilnair@hbthchina.co
PO Box. 10079 , Dubai , United Arab Emirates    http:/ /www.hbthchina.co
BK Gulf Values
Integrity
Team work
Excellence
Respect
Consider the environment. Please don't print this e-mail unless 
you really need to.
BK Gulf - Limited Liability Company, Commercial Registry No. 
45053.
This email and any attachment is intended solely for the named 
recipients and may only be read, transmitted, relied upon, or 
communicated in whole or part, by the intended recipient if so 
authorised by the sender. Any confidentiality in the contents is 
not waived or lost through mistaken transmission. If you have 
received this email in error, please inform the sender by reply, 
delete it and destroy any copies. Any views expressed in this 
email are not necessarily the views of BK Gulf LLC, Dubai 
Transport Co. LLC or its subsidiaries.  This email is not 
intended to form a legally binding offer, acceptance or 
agreement, nor to add to, amend or waive any rights in an 
existing contract all of which are subject to execution by 
authorised signature on letterhead. The sender does not accept 
liability for any loss or damage arising from any viruses 
transmitted.

subject: Re:  Dear Sir/Madam,
body:
Dear Sunil Nair,

Thank you for your email and interest in our services. We are more than willing to assist you with your project.

However, before we proceed, could you please provide us with more specific details about the project? This will help us understand your needs better and enable us to give you a more accurate quote.

Once we receive this information, we will be able to provide you with the relevant drawings and other documents required by your team. 

Please note that our lead times vary depending on the complexity of the project, but we always strive to deliver within the agreed timeframe.

Regarding the LPO Supply Agreement, we are open to discussions and negotiations to ensure that it reflects those in place between BK Gulf and the Client.

We look forward to receiving more details about your project soon.

Best wishes,
Lois
